name: LanceDB Minimal (Python)
description: Create a LanceDB table, add rows, and search by vector in Python.

files.template:
import lancedb
db = lancedb.connect('.lancedb')
tbl = db.create_table('docs', data=[{ 'vector':[0.1,0.2,0.3], 'text':'hello' }, { 'vector':[0.2,0.1,0.25], 'text':'fluorite' }])
res = tbl.search([0.1,0.2,0.3]).limit(2).to_list()
print([r['text'] for r in res])
